trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Row-rooth has something to ask you.
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Row-rooth.
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_TODO_01<tab>While transfigured, read the epitaphs.
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Row-rooth.
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_TODO_03<tab>While transfigured, read the epitaph.
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Row-rooth.
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_000<tab>I have a question─one that can only be answered by a being of flesh and bone. Will you hear it?
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_001<tab>Thank you. Before I ask, however, I require that you learn more of my kind, lest your answer be senseless and vapid.
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_002<tab>You can come to know us through our final words─though, alas, you cannot comprehend them in your corporeal form.
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_003<tab>Thus, I shall temporarily free you from your body, allowing you to perceive as we Ea do. Please indicate when you are ready to shuffle off your mortal coil.
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_010<tab>You have prepared, yes? Very well. After you have been liberated, I ask that you read three epitaphs ere returning to me.
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_011<tab>Please brace yourself, as there is the recorded evidence that this may “feel weird”...
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_SYSTEM_100_011<tab>In order to progress, you must complete the objectives while transfigured.
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_SYSTEM_200_011<tab>You will return from your transfigured status if you move too far away. Look to your map for the transfiguration's area of effect.
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_SYSTEM_300_011<tab>If necessary, speak with Row-rooth to restore the transfiguration.
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_012<tab>I ask that you read three epitaphs, then return to me.
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_013<tab>Tragically, your spirit has re-entered your body. Permit me to free you once more.
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>Something is written here in an unfamiliar script. You cannot read it as you are.
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>In order to progress, you must be under the transfigured status.
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_MONUMENTA04343_000_030<tab>(-Epitaph-)I grasp eternity, yet I hold only loss. If forever has an end, Why has it not come?
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_MONUMENTB04343_000_050<tab>(-Epitaph-)With no future, we turn to the past, Knowing none have turned to our present. We are the dead end.
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_060<tab>You have read them? This is well. However, you have yet to look upon our most important text. Please seek it in the charming wooded area outside our home.
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_061<tab>Please seek our most important text amidst the memory of trees. I do not know how to make this any clearer.
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_MONUMENTA04343_000_070<tab>(-Epitaph-)The price of eternity is joy; Its gift, unending sorrow.
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_081<tab>So you have read all that was left behind...
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_082<tab>Those inscriptions were written by the first of our kind. The first to know the pinnacle of enlightenment, and the first to know the depths of despair.
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_083<tab>They have prepared you to answer my question. As someone bound to a corporeal form, do you think there is hope to be found in life?
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_A1_000_001<tab>Of course there's hope!
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_A1_000_002<tab>The only way to know is to keep living.
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_100_090<tab>Strange... But perhaps it is precisely that spongy form which allows you to cling to the intangible unto death. How fortunate for you.
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_090<tab>Fascinating... It must be precisely that spongy form which allows you to cling to the intangible unto death. How fortunate for you.
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_100_100<tab>Fascinating... It appears that embarking on that quest for hope and seeing it to its ultimate conclusion is a sort of corporeal privilege.
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_100<tab>Fascinating... Though your flesh is spongy and weak, it gives you the strength to live in pursuit of hope.
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_110<tab>That was most edifying. Creatures of flesh enjoy shiny tokens, do they not? Please have some as thanks.
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_100_110<tab>...Ah, yes. I shall return you to your body, as it seems you are fond of it.
